name: Mordecai's Morning
description:
WARNING: If you play in your browser, the assets sometimes blur, and the music sometimes fails to properly play. I would highly advise DOWNLOADING the game if you can.

Four Endings, each attained through your actions interacting with npcs.

Assets used from Mario Tennis: Power Tour and Pokemon Emerald.

Music from various sources.

I started this project with higher aspirations, but quickly lost interest and completed it with "borrowed assets" and shoddy coding.
